Text: Letter I Sent To CongressKen Im an exEnron employee who was with Houston Pipe Line later with Enron Gas Services I want you to know I do not hold you responsible for the situation we are all currently in There is no one else I would rather have trying to make this a successful company again than yourself I have seen you in action ever since the merger I know you can do it I have attached a copy of a letter that I have sent to certain members of Congress Charge on Best of luck Jim Jurek Congressional Letter re Enrondoc
